title: Killers Amongst Us: Real Life "Hell's Kitchen," Gorgeous Restauranteur Disappears. What happened to Dawn? (part 3)
itunes:title: Killers Amongst Us: Real Life "Hell's Kitchen," Gorgeous Restauranteur Disappears. What happened to Dawn? (part 3)
description:
Not only has Dawn Viens disappeared, but her husband David has apparently moved on. He has a new girlfriend who has taken Dawn's place in David's restaurant and his home. Some things just don't add up, especially after the new girlfriend is seen throwing away Dawn's clothes. Is Dawn's drinking to blame for her vanishing act? Will she come back after ski season as David Viens suggest? Police begin to look at all the evidence again.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
